St_D_DoubleTap.name: Double Tap
St_D_DoubleTap.description: Increases Attack Damage by 5<sprite=5> and Critical Strike Chance by 20%<sprite=5>. After using a <color=yellow>Memory</color> or <color=yellow>Nimble Dodge</color>, your next <color=yellow>Basic Attack</color> fires twice.
St_D_DoubleTap.shortDescription: Enhances attacks, with double strike after skills

St_D_SalamanderPowder.name: Salamander Powder
St_D_SalamanderPowder.description: Every 4th <color=yellow>Basic Attack</color> becomes a <color=yellow>Critical Strike</color> and explodes, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>145%</color><sprite=5> area of effect <color=yellow>Fire Damage</color> to enemies. The explosion damage is increased by 100% against <color=yellow>Burning Enemies</color>.
St_D_SalamanderPowder.shortDescription: Periodic critical explosion with area fire damage

St_Q_HandCannon.name: Hand Cannon
St_Q_HandCannon.description: Fires an incendiary round, knocking you back and dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>80%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire Damage</color> to enemies in front of you. Nearby enemies are instead dealt <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>180%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire Damage</color> and are knocked back.

St_Q_IncendiaryRounds.name: Incendiary Rounds
St_Q_IncendiaryRounds.description: The next 4 basic attacks are 60%<sprite=5> faster and deal an additional <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>100%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire Damage</color>, briefly increasing <color=yellow>Lacerta</color>'s <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color>.

achievement.name: Just Like the Old Days
achievement.description: Defeat the Heroic Boss (main boss of each region) 4 times as Lacerta.

St_R_PrecisionShot.name: Precision Shot
St_R_PrecisionShot.description:
<color=yellow>Hold</color> the cast key to enter aiming stance. After aiming, fire an armor-piercing round that deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>150%</color><sprite=5>~<sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>800%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> and <color=yellow>stuns</color> for 0.5~2.5 seconds to all enemies hit, proportional to aim duration.
Reach maximum range, stun duration, and damage after aiming for 1 seconds.

achievement.name: Untouchable
achievement.description: Defeat the Heroic Boss (main boss of each region) as Lacerta with 85% or more health remaining.

St_R_QuickTrigger.name: Quick Draw
St_R_QuickTrigger.description: Rapidly fire 3 piercing shots that deal <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>120%</color><sprite=5> damage to up to 3 enemies.

St_D_AstridsMasterpiece.name: Astrid's Masterpiece
St_D_AstridsMasterpiece.description: The first 3 <color=yellow>Attacks</color> against individual enemies deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>85%</color><sprite=5> bonus damage and grant Mist a <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>47%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Shield</color> that fades over 1.5 seconds. This effect can be triggered again on each enemy after 6<sprite=5> seconds.

St_Q_Fleche.name: Flèche
St_Q_Fleche.description:
Dash towards the target dealing <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>140%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Damage</color>, immediately perform a <color=yellow>Basic Attack</color>, and temporarily increase <color=yellow>Mist</color>'s <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color>. If this <color=yellow>Damage</color> kills the target, restore 15<sprite=5> Health and reduce <color=yellow>Cooldown</color> by 15%.

<color=yellow>Charges</color> are fully restored at once.

achievement.name: King of the Elementals
achievement.description: Defeat any elemental 45 times as Mist.

St_Q_Lunge.name: Lunge
St_Q_Lunge.description: Dash forward and thrust your saber toward the nearest enemy. Triggers <color=yellow>Attack Effects</color> and deals <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>200%</color><sprite=5> damage to all enemies hit by the saber. Each time <color=yellow>Astrid's Masterpiece</color> triggers, reduce this <color=yellow>Cooldown</color> by 0.5 seconds.

St_R_Parry.name: Parry
St_R_Parry.description: Parry the first incoming damage from the front within 0.6 seconds, dealing <color=yellow>Damage</color> to up to 5<sprite=5> enemies. Hit enemies take <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>360%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Damage</color>, become <color=yellow>Stunned</color>, and reset <color=yellow>Astrid's Masterpiece</color> effect. Upon successful parry, become <color=yellow>Immune</color> to all damage briefly and reduce <color=yellow>Parry</color>'s <color=yellow>Cooldown</color> by 50%.

achievement.name: Go with the Flow
achievement.description: Defeat 70 enemies in a row without taking damage as Mist.

St_R_UnbreakableDetermination.name: Unbreakable Determination
St_R_UnbreakableDetermination.description:
Reset the cooldown of <color=yellow>Swift Step</color>, deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>400%</color><sprite=5> damage to nearby enemies, and enter <color=yellow>Awakened State</color> for 12 seconds.

 While <color=yellow>Awakened</color>, gain 25%<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> and each <color=yellow>Attack</color> triggers a lightning explosion dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>90%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Damage</color> to the target and nearby enemies. During <color=yellow>Awakened State</color>, when <color=yellow>Astrid's Masterpiece</color> triggers, recover health equal to 4% of your missing health.

St_D_Resolve.name: Resolve
St_D_Resolve.description: Increases <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color> by 70<sprite=5>. Every 4th <color=yellow>Basic Attack</color> becomes a <color=yellow>Critical Strike</color>, knocking back enemies and stunning them for 1 seconds. When <color=yellow>Resolve</color> hits an enemy, <color=yellow>Vesper</color> <color=yellow>recovers</color> 3%<sprite=5> of his <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color>.
St_D_Resolve.shortDescription: Increase HP, strikes stun and heal

St_Q_CruelSun.name: Cruel Sun
St_Q_CruelSun.description:
<color=yellow>Hold the cast key</color> to focus the sun's power into your hammer. Upon fully charging, slam the ground to deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>100%</color><sprite=5>~<sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>350%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire Damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>Stun</color> them for 0.5~1.5 seconds.

While channeling, you cannot move but become <color=yellow>Unstoppable</color> and gain 60<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Armor</color>.

St_R_SanctuaryOfEl.name: Sanctuary of El
St_R_SanctuaryOfEl.description:
<color=yellow>Vesper</color> blesses the surrounding ground for 10 seconds, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>500%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> to nearby enemies and granting allies a <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Shield</color> that lasts for 4 seconds. Allies on the blessed ground gain 18<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Defense</color> and 20%<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color>.

<color=yellow>Vesper</color> himself receives 200% of the effect and becomes <color=yellow>Unstoppable</color> while under the effect.

St_D_ConvergencePoint.name: Converging Stars
St_D_ConvergencePoint.description: Casting a <color=yellow>Memory</color> or using <color=yellow>Flicker</color> grants 10<sprite=5> <color=yellow>Attack Damage</color> for 3 seconds. During this time, your <color=yellow>Basic Attacks</color> are empowered to bounce to up to 2 targets with 50% effectiveness.
St_D_ConvergencePoint.shortDescription: Boosts damage, attacks bounce after skills

St_D_ExoticMatter.name: Exotic Matter
St_D_ExoticMatter.description: Gain 1 stack of <color=yellow>Exotic Matter</color> when casting a <color=yellow>Memory</color> or using <color=yellow>Flicker</color>. Your next <color=yellow>Basic Attack</color> consumes all stacks to create an explosion, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>125%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> per stack to enemies. Can hold up to 4 stacks.

St_Q_EtherealInfluence.name: Ethereal Influence
St_Q_EtherealInfluence.description: Launch <color=yellow>Ether</color> that moves forward and returns, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>160%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> to enemies. Reactivate to cause <color=yellow>Ether</color> to <color=yellow>Explode</color>, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>180%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> and <color=yellow>Rooting</color> enemies for 3 seconds.

St_Q_SuperNova.name: Supernova
St_Q_SuperNova.description: Create an expanding star at the target location that slows enemies, then channel for up to 3 seconds. During this time, you cannot attack or use memories. Reactivating <color=yellow>Supernova</color> detonates the star, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> to enemies. The explosion becomes more powerful with charge time, increasing damage up to 225% after 1.3 seconds.
St_Q_SuperNova.shortDescription: Charge to deal powerful Light Damage

St_R_Cataclysm.name: Cataclysm
St_R_Cataclysm.description: Gain a shield of <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>150%</color><sprite=5> and increase <color=yellow>Ability Power</color> by 30% for 12 seconds. During this time, <color=yellow>Cataclysm</color> can be reactivated up to 3 times to drop meteors at target locations. Meteors briefly stun enemies and deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>250%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color>.
St_R_Cataclysm.shortDescription: Increase Ability Power, reactivate to summon meteors

St_R_Tranquility.name: Tranquility
St_R_Tranquility.description: <color=yellow>Yubar</color> <color=yellow>Channels</color> for 1 seconds to regain tranquility. During this time, becomes <color=yellow>Invulnerable</color>, gains 40% <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color>, and reduces the <color=yellow>Cooldown</color> of all other memories by 3.5<sprite=5> seconds.

achievement.name: Peace Amid the Storm
achievement.description: Deal a total of 250,000 Light Damage to enemies with Yubar.

St_C_BeamOfLight.name: Beam of Light
St_C_BeamOfLight.description: Focus your mind to fire a beam at the enemy over 1.7<sprite=5> seconds, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>507%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> per second and <color=yellow>Healing</color> the nearby ally with the lowest health percentage by <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>73%</color><sprite=5> per second.
St_C_BeamOfLight.shortDescription: Enemy Light Damage and Ally Healing

St_C_DarkBolt.name: Dark Bolt
St_C_DarkBolt.description: Fires a dark bolt that deals <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>175%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color> to enemies and triggers <color=yellow>Attack Effects</color>. Pierces up to 2 enemies.
St_C_DarkBolt.shortDescription: Fires an arrow that deals dark damage

St_C_DarkSpear.name: Dark Spear
St_C_DarkSpear.description: Pierce enemies in front, dealing <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>210%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color>, triggering <color=yellow>Attack Effects</color>, and pulling them to the center.

St_C_GlacialStomp.name: Glacial Stomp
St_C_GlacialStomp.description: Stomp the ground around you, stunning enemies for 1.5 seconds and dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>230%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Cold Damage</color>. Gain a shield that lasts for 3 seconds and absorbs <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>60%</color><sprite=5> damage for each enemy hit.

St_C_IceBlock.name: Ice Shield
St_C_IceBlock.description: Surrounds an ally with an ice shield, granting a <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>130%</color><sprite=5> shield that lasts for 3 seconds. When the shield is destroyed, it deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>160%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Cold Damage</color> to nearby enemies and <color=yellow>restores</color> <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>60%</color><sprite=5> health to the ally for each enemy hit.
St_C_IceBlock.shortDescription: Melee Cold Damage, Ally Shield, Restoration

St_C_IceClaw.name: Ice Claw
St_C_IceClaw.description: Swing your claw forward to deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>140%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Cold Damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>Stun</color> them for 0.5 seconds. You can swing once more to deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>264%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Cold Damage</color> and <color=yellow>Stun</color> them for 1 seconds.

St_C_PressurePoint.name: Pressure Point
St_C_PressurePoint.description: Releases energy from the palm, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>180%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Damage</color> and pushing back all hit enemies. If a pushed enemy hits a wall, they take an additional <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>374%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Damage</color> and are stunned for 1.5 seconds.

St_C_Starfall.name: Starfall
St_C_Starfall.description: Drops 4<sprite=5> random starfalls near enemies. Each starfall deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>70%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color>.

St_E_AntiGravity.name: Anti-Gravity
St_E_AntiGravity.description: Reverses gravity in the target area, lifting all enemies within the range for 1.6 seconds. Then slams them down, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>400%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Damage</color>.

St_E_Blink.name: Blink
St_E_Blink.description: <color=yellow>Teleport</color> a short distance and deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>244%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire Damage</color> to nearby enemies. <color=yellow>Cooldown</color> is reduced by 13% for each enemy hit.

St_E_ChainLightning.name: Chain Lightning
St_E_ChainLightning.description: Cast a bouncing lightning that deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>400%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> to the first target and bounces up to 5 times, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>185%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color>.

achievement.name: Electric Type
achievement.description: Deal 1,000 more damage in a single hit.

St_E_FlameJet.name: Flame Jet
St_E_FlameJet.description: Spew a stream of flames for 2.5 seconds. Enemies hit by this flame stream take <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>336%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>fire damage</color> per second.

St_E_SearingCharge.name: Searing Charge
St_E_SearingCharge.description: Quickly slash through enemies with a flaming sword, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>60%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire Damage</color> and an additional <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>240%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire Damage</color>. Damage and range increase proportionally to <color=yellow>Movement Speed</color>. If an enemy is killed by this damage, <color=yellow>Cooldown</color> is reset.

St_E_UmbralEdge.name: Umbral Edge
St_E_UmbralEdge.description: For 7 seconds, imbue your weapon with the power of darkness, increasing <color=yellow>Critical Hit Chance</color> by 20%<sprite=5> and dealing <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>52%</color><sprite=5> additional <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color> on <color=yellow>Attack</color>. <color=yellow>Melee Travelers</color> deal 25% increased additional damage.

St_E_WinterDive.name: Winter Dive
St_E_WinterDive.description: Leap high into the air wrapped in winter's power and slam down at the target location, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>340%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Cold Damage</color> to all enemies in the area and <color=yellow>Stunning</color> them for 1.5 seconds.

St_L_Hysteria.name: Hysteria
St_L_Hysteria.description: Embrace intense rage for 6 seconds. During this time, you cannot <color=yellow>cast</color> other memories but continuously slash with claws, dealing <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>100%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>healing</color> yourself for <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>13%</color><sprite=5>. If your health is below 40%, healing is increased by 150%. Triggers <color=yellow>Attack Effects</color> on first hit. Slashes faster with higher <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color>.

achievement.name: Protector of the Forest
achievement.description: Defeat the Demon of the Forest, the boss of the first region, for the first time.

St_L_Multishot.name: Arrow Storm
St_L_Multishot.description: For 6 seconds, increase Attack Speed by 15%<sprite=5> and Movement Speed by 10%. During this time, each <color=yellow>Attack</color> fires 3 arrows. Each arrow deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>35%</color><sprite=5> damage, and the first arrow triggers <color=yellow>Attack Effects</color>.
St_L_Multishot.shortDescription: Increases Attack Speed and enhances attacks

St_L_WorldCracker.name: World Cracker
St_L_WorldCracker.description: Channel to emit a powerful beam that deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>575%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> per second to all enemies it touches. You cannot move while channeling, but can maintain it indefinitely until canceled.

achievement.name: Kamehameha
achievement.description: Defeat the Spirit of Light for the first time. To encounter this boss, obtain the "Fragment of Radiance" (a random drop during gameplay), then use it to complete the "World of the Netherworld" quest by delivering it to the designated area, where you'll find the entrance to the boss fight.

St_R_Chomp.name: Chomp
St_R_Chomp.description: Bites the target enemy, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>370%</color><sprite=5> damage and restoring <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>75%</color><sprite=5> health.

St_R_FlamingWhip.name: Flaming Whip
St_R_FlamingWhip.description:
Lash out a flaming whip, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>fire damage</color> to enemies in front and briefly reducing their <color=yellow>movement speed</color>.
If you <color=yellow>cast</color> a memory other than <color=yellow>Flaming Whip</color>, the <color=yellow>cooldown</color> is reset.

achievement.name: Whatever It takes
achievement.description: Defeat an enemy while they have 20 or more stacks of Burn

St_R_Frostbite.name: Frostbite
St_R_Frostbite.description: Your next 2 <color=yellow>Attacks</color> are faster and enhanced. The first attack deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>50%</color><sprite=5> additional <color=yellow>Cold Damage</color> and grants you a <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>110%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Shield</color> that lasts for 2 seconds. The second attack deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>180%</color><sprite=5> additional <color=yellow>Cold Damage</color>.

St_R_GlacialHammer.name: Glacial Hammer
St_R_GlacialHammer.description: Slam a hammer of ice in front of you, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>220%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Cold Damage</color> to enemies and pulling them towards your location. Enemies hit directly at the center of the hammer take <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>385%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Cold Damage</color> instead.

St_R_Ignite.name: Ignite
St_R_Ignite.description: Deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>115%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire Damage</color> to the target. If the target is already burning, damage is increased by 50% and deals <color=yellow>Area Damage</color>. Charges fully at once.

St_R_PillarOfFlame.name: Pillar of Flame
St_R_PillarOfFlame.description: Summons a pillar of fire at the target area, immediately dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>250%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire Damage</color> to all enemies within range, then deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>275%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Fire Damage</color> over 2.4 seconds.

St_R_RepulsiveShield.name: Repulsive Shield
St_R_RepulsiveShield.description: Blocks damage from enemies in front for 1.9<sprite=5> seconds. Each time damage is blocked, deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>240%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> to up to 4 enemies in front.

St_R_Scattershot.name: Scattershot
St_R_Scattershot.description: Fires 5 dark bullets that spread out in front. Each bullet deals <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>100%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color> and triggers 50% <color=yellow>Attack Effects</color>.

St_R_ShadowWalk.name: Shadow Walk
St_R_ShadowWalk.description: Quickly dash forward and fire 3 dark shards at nearby enemies. Each shard deals <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>65%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color> and triggers 50% <color=yellow>Attack Effect</color>.
St_R_ShadowWalk.shortDescription: Dash and attack nearby enemies, dark

St_R_StaticDischarge.name: Static Discharge
St_R_StaticDischarge.description:
<color=yellow>Hold down</color> the cast key to charge up static. When fully charged, detonate the static to deal <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>150%</color><sprite=5>~<sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>600%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>light damage</color> to enemies based on the charge time, knocking them back and reducing their <color=yellow>movement speed</color>.
Charging for 1 seconds will maximize the damage and range.

St_E_Rewind.name: Rewind
St_E_Rewind.description: Reduces the <color=yellow>Cooldown</color> of the last used <color=yellow>Memory</color> by 5.5<sprite=5> seconds. The next <color=yellow>Memory</color> cast within 8 seconds is enhanced, dealing an additional <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>160%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Damage</color> when it first hits an enemy.

St_Q_Discipline.name: Discipline
St_Q_Discipline.description: Charge at the target and slam your hammer, dealing <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>110%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> to enemies and triggering 50% <color=yellow>Attack Effect</color>. Each time you <color=yellow>Attack</color> an enemy, the <color=yellow>Cooldown</color> is <color=yellow>reduced</color> by 8%.

achievement.name: Peak Performance
achievement.description: As Vesper, have 3 dash or teleport memories simultaneously.

St_D_MercyOfEl.name: Mercy of El
St_D_MercyOfEl.description:
<color=yellow>Attack Damage</color> is increased by 12<sprite=5>. Every 4th <color=yellow>Basic Attack</color> becomes a <color=yellow>Critical Strike</color> and deals an additional <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>70%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color>.
Each time you <color=yellow>Attack</color> an enemy, <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> is increased by 4%<sprite=5> for 4 seconds, up to a maximum of 24%<sprite=5>. When <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color> is at maximum, <color=yellow>Attacking</color> an enemy <color=yellow>Restores</color> 3%<sprite=5> of <color=yellow>Lost Health</color>.
St_D_MercyOfEl.shortDescription: Attack for speed, crits, and healing

achievement.name: Master of Hammer
achievement.description: Perform 9 basic attack within 5 seconds using Vesper.

St_M_NimbleDodge.name: Nimble Dodge
St_M_NimbleDodge.description: Move swiftly to evade enemy attacks.

St_M_Charge.name: Heavy Strike
St_M_Charge.description: Gain a <color=yellow>Shield</color> equal to 10% of <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color> for 1.5 seconds and <color=yellow>Charge</color> forward. If you collide with an enemy, the <color=yellow>Charge</color> ends early, dealing 15% of your <color=yellow>Maximum Health</color> as <color=yellow>damage</color> to enemies and knocking them back.
St_M_Charge.shortDescription: Shielded dash that damages and knocks back

St_M_FastFeet.name: Swift Steps
St_M_FastFeet.description: Move quickly to evade enemy attacks.

St_M_Flicker.name: Flicker
St_M_Flicker.description:
Instantly teleport to the target location to evade enemy attacks.
<color=yellow>Can be used even when unable to use Memories.</color>

St_D_DisintegratingClaw.name: Disintegrating Claw
St_D_DisintegratingClaw.description: Attacks deal <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>68%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>additional damage</color> and <color=yellow>restore</color> <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>16%</color><sprite=5> of my health per enemy hit. Against <color=yellow>Bosses</color>, <color=yellow>additional damage</color> and <color=yellow>restoration</color> are increased by 100%.

St_M_FeatheryDash.name: Feathery Dash
St_M_FeatheryDash.description: Swiftly move to evade enemy attacks.

St_Q_GoldenBurst.name: Golden Burst
St_Q_GoldenBurst.description:
Create a golden explosion forward that deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>110%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>heals</color> allies for <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>28%</color><sprite=5>. When hitting a single target, this explosion's <color=yellow>damage</color> or <color=yellow>healing</color> is increased by 100%.

Upon casting, gain <color=yellow>Corrosion</color> stacks for 3.5 seconds and <color=yellow>sacrifice</color> 5% of your maximum health. Each <color=yellow>Corrosion</color> stack increases the explosion's <color=yellow>damage</color> and <color=yellow>healing</color> by 100%, but also increases the health <color=yellow>sacrificed</color> by 7% of your maximum health.

St_R_DangerousTheory.name: Dangerous Theory
St_R_DangerousTheory.description:
Dash forward and empower my next <color=yellow>Basic Attack</color>. My next <color=yellow>Basic Attack</color> becomes a <color=yellow>Critical Strike</color>, deals <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>125%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Additional Damage</color> and knocks back the target.

If my <color=yellow>Current Health</color> is below 60% when casting <color=yellow>Dangerous Theory</color>, <color=yellow>Additional Damage</color> increases by 100%, <color=yellow>Cooldown</color> is reduced by 25%, and I <color=yellow>Heal</color> <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>60%</color><sprite=5> for each enemy hit. Against <color=yellow>Boss</color> targets, <color=yellow>Additional Damage</color> and <color=yellow>Healing</color> increase by 100%.

St_C_Sneeze.name: Sneeze
St_C_Sneeze.description:
The memory of a truly big and refreshing sneeze. Fires a powerful sneeze forward.
This memory is completely useless.

St_L_MentalCorruption.name: Mental Corruption
St_L_MentalCorruption.description: Corrupts the minds of the target and those around them, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color> and <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>60%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color> every 0.5 seconds until death.

achievement.name: Déjà Vu
achievement.description: After beginning NG+, pet the black cat, which spawns randomly in the lobby areas.

St_R_BlackArbalest.name: Black Arbalest
St_R_BlackArbalest.description: Fires an arbalest bolt that <color=yellow>pierces</color> through enemies, dealing <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>250%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color>, knocking them back, and triggering <color=yellow>Attack Effects</color>. Each time an enemy is <color=yellow>pierced</color>, the <color=yellow>damage</color> dealt to the next enemy increases by 35%.

St_E_ClutchesOfMalice.name: Clutches of Malice
St_E_ClutchesOfMalice.description:
Summons blood tentacles at the target location, pulling up to 4<sprite=5> enemies. The tentacles attach to enemies, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>80%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> and an additional <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> to pulled enemies. 
When this memory is enhanced, the <color=yellow>number of enemies</color> pulled and <color=yellow>range</color> increase.

achievement.name: Snake in the Grass
achievement.description: Take the merchant's unattended backpack, found in merchant areas occupied by Hunters, 12 times.

St_R_Smite.name: Lightning Strike
St_R_Smite.description: After a brief delay, strike the area with lightning, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>400%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Light Damage</color> to enemies and <color=yellow>Stunning</color> them for 1 seconds. Has a 50% chance to set enemies on <color=yellow>Fire</color>.
St_R_Smite.shortDescription: Deal heavy light damage to target

St_C_BackStep.name: Backstep
St_C_BackStep.description: Leap backward and drop 3 shock bombs at the original position, each dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>120%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Damage</color> and <color=yellow>Stunning</color> for 1 seconds.

St_C_Purgatory.name: Purgatory
St_C_Purgatory.description: Deals <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>280%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>damage</color> to all enemies in the target area and heals random allies for <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>45%</color><sprite=5> health per enemy hit. If the target is a boss, healing is tripled.

St_R_GreatFrostSword.name: Great Frost Sword
St_R_GreatFrostSword.description: Summon and swing a great frost sword, dealing <sprite=1><color=#16D7FF>200%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Cold Damage</color> to enemies in front and knocking them back. If it hits a single target, <color=yellow>Damage</color> is increased by 200%.

St_L_ShoutOfOblivion.name: Shout of Oblivion
St_L_ShoutOfOblivion.description:
Become <color=yellow>Invulnerable</color> briefly while channeling, then unleash a powerful shout forward, dealing <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>1,300%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Dark Damage</color> to all enemies and <color=yellow>Stunning</color> them for 3 seconds.

This <color=yellow>Damage</color> increases by 25% for each current <color=yellow>Hunt Level</color>.
St_L_ShoutOfOblivion.shortDescription: Ultimate ability, powerful AoE dark damage

achievement.name: Chaos, Destruction, Oblivion
achievement.description: Defeat the Hunter of Oblivion for the first time. To encounter this boss, stay in Hunter-occupied areas to increase "Hunter Threat" until it reaches its maximum, triggering the "Hunter of Oblivion" quest, then fail this quest to access the boss fight.

St_C_Whirlwind.name: Spinning Whirlwind
St_C_Whirlwind.description: <color=yellow>Channel</color> for 3.5 seconds, swinging your sword to deal <sprite=2><color=#FF8A2D>170%</color><sprite=5> <color=yellow>Damage</color> per second to nearby enemies and trigger 25% <color=yellow>Attack Effect</color>. Swings faster with higher <color=yellow>Attack Speed</color>.
